price: Ndio hivyo! Basi ionjeni! Na bila ya shaka makafiri wana adhabu ya Moto.
arabic: ذَٰلِكُمۡ فَذُوقُوهُ وَأَنَّ لِلۡكَٰفِرِينَ عَذَابَ ٱلنَّارِ
footnotes: Enyi Waumini! Hivyo ndio vita, basi vionjeni, na muwe na yakini kuwa mtapata nusura na kuungwa mkono. Na wanao pinga Ishara za Mwenyezi Mungu watapata adhabu nyengine Siku ya Kiyama, nayo ni adhabu ya Moto.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: dhālikum fadhūqūhu wa-anna lil'kāfirīna ʿadhāba al-nāri
